PATIENT_ID: TEST_DELIRIUM_001
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-01-15 08:00:00

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-01-17 06:00:00
Patient developed delirium on hospital day 3.
Acute confusional state with waxing and waning consciousness.
Disoriented to time and place.
CAM positive for delirium.
Restlessness and agitation noted overnight.

[NURSING_NOTE] 2026-01-17 05:00:00
Patient confused and disoriented. Pulling at lines.
New onset confusion reported by night shift.
